content: this cozy knit dog coat is perfect for small dogs who need a little extra warmth and comfort during the colder months with simple ribbing this free knit pattern is easy to work up using thick bernat blanket pet yarn with everfresh® probiotic technology this yarn is a safe and natural solution for helping reduce pet odors materials size u s 10 6 mm double pointed needles size u s 10 6 mm circular knitting needles stitch markers sizes to fit dog chest measurement s 10 25 5 cm m 14 35 5 cm l 17 43 cm xl 20 51 cm finished chest s 12 30 5 cm m 16 40 6 cm l 19 48 cm xl 22 56 cm
